text: Indian equity benchmarks fluctuated between gains and losses after making fresh record highs amid a lack of new catalysts following four days of gains.The S&P BSE Sensex rose as much as 0.35 percent to 33,956.31, while the NSE Nifty 50 Index rose 0.3 percent to a lifetime high of Rs 10,494.The market breadth was tilted towards the buyers. All of the 19 sector gauges compiled by the BSE Ltd. rose, led by the S&P BSE Consumer Durables Index's 1.83 percent jump. Meanwhile, S&P BSE Telecom Index was the only sector that fell.
title: Stocks Radar: Tata Steel, Religare Enterprises, HDFC
